This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with the neighbors and a fireball was visible in the sky. It looked like the flame of a hot air balloon but it was moving too fast for one. We all observed as it went across the sky. We took out our phones at the time and took a picture of it. We were all shocked and had no idea what it could have possibly been. We lost sight of it as it left view in the sky.
Summary: Looked like a hot air balloon with flame.
